speaker.whotheyare: Dr. Lucy Hone translates the best of resilience research to help people cope with tough times.
speaker.whylisten: While there are many resilience researchers in the world, the death of her 12-year old daughter in a tragic road accident, makes Lucy Hone's story totally unique. An internationally sought-after professional speaker and award-winning academic, her refreshing approach to bereavement is shared via online Coping With Loss courses and her best-selling book, Resilient Grieving. Her work is regularly featured in global media, including The Guardian, The Washington Post and the BBC.
